sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.GenerateSaml2MetaDatav2</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>This new script_include is defined as part of OpenSAML V3 upgrade to generate SP metadata.

1. saveFormData() - To use, first call saveFormData with respective idp sys_id (sso_id) and with the form changes (if any made without save),
saveFormData resolve between serialized non saved form changes and saved glide record and set the result record in GlideSession. Referred from 'Generate Metadata' UI action.

2. generateMetaData() - Call generateMetaData with respective sso_id to further prepare metadata. Referred from saml2meta.do UI page

</description>
        <name>GenerateSaml2MetaDatav2</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var GenerateSaml2MetaDatav2 = Class.create();

GenerateSaml2MetaDatav2.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	saveFormData: function(sso_id, serializedFields) {
		SNC.SAML2MetadataGenerator.saveIDPRecordAfterApplyingChanges(sso_id, serializedFields);
	},

	generateMetaData: function (sso_id) {
		var propertiesGR = this.getIDPRecord(sso_id);
		return SNC.SAML2MetadataGenerator.generateMetadata(propertiesGR);
	},

	getIDPRecord: function(sso_id) {
		var propertiesGR = SNC.SAML2MetadataGenerator.getIDPConfigRecordFromSession();
		if(propertiesGR == null) {
			SNC.GlideMultiSSO.logDebug("Received null properties GR from session. Using sys_id = {" + sso_id + "} to fetch record");
			propertiesGR = SNC.GlideMultiSSO.getIDPRecordForMetadata(sso_id);
		}
		return propertiesGR;
	},

	type: 'GenerateSaml2MetaDatav2'
};
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-12-14 09:36:54</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>18ec053673122300e8fa0dd43cf6a7ae</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>145</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>GenerateSaml2MetaDatav2</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Integration - Multiple Provider Single Sign-On (do not activate...use 'Integration - Multiple Provid" source="com.snc.integration.sso.multi">4762a9692fe21110d8a4d5f62799b613</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_18ec053673122300e8fa0dd43cf6a7ae</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-01-17 04:56:54</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>834</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
